channel.title: CVE Feed for Lansweeper -- lansweeper
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lansweeper -- lansweeper

item.title: CVE-2022-22149|2024-08-03T03:07:48.266Z -- lansweeper -- lansweeper
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the HelpdeskEmailActions.aspx functionality of Lansweeper lansweeper 9.1.20.2. A specially-crafted HTTP request can cause SQL injection. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21210|2024-08-03T02:31:59.870Z -- lansweeper -- lansweeper
item.description: An SQL injection vulnerability exists in the AssetActions.aspx functionality of Lansweeper lansweeper 9.1.20.2. A specially-crafted HTTP request can cause SQL injection. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21234|2024-08-03T02:31:59.059Z -- lansweeper -- lansweeper
item.description: An SQL injection vulnerability exists in the EchoAssets.aspx functionality of Lansweeper lansweeper 9.1.20.2. A specially-crafted HTTP request can cause SQL injection. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-27498|2024-08-03T05:32:57.961Z -- lansweeper -- lansweeper
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the TicketTemplateActions.aspx GetTemplateAttachment functionality of Lansweeper lansweeper 10.1.1.0. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21145|2024-08-03T02:31:58.707Z -- lansweeper -- lansweeper
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the WebUserActions.aspx functionality of Lansweeper lansweeper 9.1.20.2. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript code injection. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
